review: Set up was easy, works well, and there is an app for my phone that makes control very easy, especially for adding user names and passwords.
author: Charlie Carpenter "CD Carpenter"

review: I had no problems with this from the start.  It's been amazing.  I would recommend this to anyone!  Love the fact I can use it to watch Netflix also.  Have only had it a short time and now I'm having a hard time turning it off  :-)
author: Marlene Znidar

review: Netflix is where we have our problem.  You can't search for a movie or show so you have to browse and hope you find something you like.  Otherwise it's ok.
author: Mary K. Field

review: Better then another box laying on desk.  Disappointed in not quite enough stations available free... A lot of cost to watch things.
author: Cathy Prenkert

review: I like it! I still have a lot to explore but so far it's pretty good. I have noticed it freezes from time to time. I also enjoy the remote app on my smartphone! Very handy!
author: FROSTIE

review: I actually cant believe more people do not own the fire stick.  It is fast and responsive!
author: nelson cabral

review: This device is a great buy.  It has many more apps than I thought when I bought it.
author: Amazon Customer
